title: Caster, ca. 1820
provenance: Cecil Davis, LTD, London, (7-24-63) purchased by WPW.
dimensions: H x diam.: 8 x 5.2 cm (3 1/8 x 2 1/16 in.)
description: Globular body, on stemmed circular foot. body decorated with diamond cutting, and prismatic rings. Diamonds on upper portion are smaller and contain holes for pouring. Hole for cork on bottom of foot.

tombstone.epitaph:
Caster, ca. 1820.
ca. 1820. glass. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-176.
